articles.author: Leslie Josephs
articles.title: American posts fifth consecutive loss, Southwest turn profit thanks to federal aid - CNBC
articles.description: Southwest says leisure bookings are on the rise and that it will increase its flying schedule later this spring.
articles.content:
Southwest Airlines on Thursday said leisure travel bookings continue to rise and that it expects to break even "or better" by June.
The Dallas-based airline posted first-quarter net income of $116 m… [+1426 chars]

articles.title: Psaki pressed on whether Biden 'acknowledges his own role in systemic racism' in America - Fox News
articles.description: White House press secretary Jen Psaki had an uncomfortable exchange with a reporter Wednesday after he asked whether President Biden "acknowledges his own role" in what the president described as "systemic racism" in America.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: The eight contenders for the best picture Oscar - Eyewitness News
articles.description: The blockbusters may be absent, but an eclectic array of titles are in the mix, from a lavish Netflix ode to Tinseltown's Golden Age to a tiny indie drama about Korean immigrants scraping out a living off the land in rural America.

articles.title: The U.S. is vaccinating millions of Americans daily, but here's why COVID-19 cases and hospitalizations are up - CTV News
articles.description: Experts say COVID-19 vaccinations in the U.S. are continuing at an impressive pace, and now all Americans 16 and up can get a shot. But a leading health official said that the country remains in a 'complicated stage' of the pandemic.
